name: Iansan
desc:
"Tempered in Molten Stone" lansan

Early to bed, early to rise. Avoid anything high in sugar or sodium.

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
The Three Principles of Power

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Dynamic Skin can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
.
Lustrous Skin can only be purchased after obtaining Dynamic Skin.

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"A match, you say? Sure, I've been training for this — it'll be good experience!"
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: lansan's deck is built around preparing Skills and switching characters. It excels at providing high DMG bonuses to teammates.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc:
"Tempered in Molten Stone" lansan

Early to bed, early to rise. Avoid anything high in sugar or sodium.

customize.name: Sayu
customize.desc:
"Mujina Ninja" Sayu

By your side without a trace, like a character from a dream.

customize.name: Candace
customize.desc:
Golden Vow: Candace

The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 2</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, enters</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, gains 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, and creates 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Agile Switch</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>The character to which this is attached accumulates</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Max 2 points)</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>When the character has 0 Nightsoul points, they exit</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Agile Switch</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> <color=#ffffffa6>This switch will be considered a</color> <color=#ffffff>Fast Action</color> <color=#ffffffa6>instead of a</color> <color=#ffffff>Combat Action</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Can stack, no stack limit)</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 3</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, enters</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, gains 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, and creates</color> <color=#ffffff>Kinetic Energy Scale</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>The character to which this is attached accumulates</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Max 2 points)</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>When the character has 0 Nightsoul points, they exit</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Kinetic Energy Scale</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your character deals DMG:</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Deal +2 DMG for this instance. If</color> <color=#ffffff>Iansan</color> <color=#ffffffa6>is in</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>,</color> <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> <color=#ffffffa6>is not consumed, but consume 1 of</color> <color=#ffffff>Iansan</color> <color=#ffffffa6>'s</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> <color=#ffffffa6>instead.</color>
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>(Passive) While this character is in</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, after your character performs</color> <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> <color=#ffffffa6>or switches 2 times, if their</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> <color=#ffffffa6>are 2, then heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP. Otherwise, gain 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (3 times per Round)</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>The character to which this is attached accumulates</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Max 2 points)</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>When the character has 0 Nightsoul points, they exit</color> <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Fast Action</color>
You can continue with other actions after conducing 1 Fast Action.
Only after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.
<color=#ece5d8>Combat Action</color>
After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponents turn.
<color=#ffffff>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

value.name: Teachings of the Collective of Plenty
value.desc:
lansan: Teachings of the Collective of Plenty

"On my mark!"

value.text: <color=#ffffffa6>Reward for inviting lansan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her</color>

value.name: Iansan
value.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.
